overview: A desperate cry of a child abandoned by a mother who cannot give him love, assuming an adult role, as his mother is adrift in eternal mourning for a daughter she lost some time ago. The loss of a daughter is a process capable of fracturing a family. But they are the members of it, the only ones who can give relief to such pain ... although at the risk of falling into a spiral towards denial, where they feed back even more the already existing suffering.
title: Ali
